author: Abraham Lincoln
message: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
title: Thought of the day

author: Rene Descartes
message: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
title: Thought of the day

message: The best place to find a helping hand is at the end of your own arm.
title: Thought of the day

author: Blaise Pascal
message: We know the truth, not only by the reason, but by the heart.
title: Thought of the day
